name: You, And A Cube.
description:
these screenshots were made during testing, and f***ing around. the actual game is just you, and a cube. more updates and additions will be added soon.

This game is a test. i made this game to test the physics in unity, and have fun with them.

but it turned out to become an actual game, which i for some reason wanna work on, and develop.

if you want me to add anything new in the next update, leave a suggestion in the comments.
